name: dtdmenu
description:
Adds a Dtd menu. Dtd as in docbook and xhtml. e.g
          <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.3//EN"
	      "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.3/docbookx.dtd">

it currently features 6 dtd's (xml docbook (2). HTML (3), XHTM(1))
The provided skeletons depends  on xml.vim for its expansion. 
If you want to add your own DTD entries look in the file for instructions how to do that
install_details: cp dtdmenu.vim to your plugin directory
